message.body: Good morning, darling! I love you oh so so much! Have a good day and talk to ya later :)
Good night, my love! I love YOU oh so very very much!
Oh no time for sleeping! Chatting on fb and watching departures. So much to do!!
Haha. You're crazy. Get some sleep. Did anyone say anything about your 2 weeks? Everything okay?
Oh is all perfectly fine. No one said anything except the ppl i work with directly. They said "ut oh, department's f-ed" but congratulated me ha
Hahaha. GOOD!
I busted out a bottle of sparkling peach to celebrate haha. Kosher of course
..... WE STILL DIDNT DRINK THE ONE I HAVE!
I couldnt wait!!!! Haha we will pop it open to celebrate...something!!
We should have celebrated our engagement!!!!! I think that's pretty good.
Oh yeah. I liked that. That was a good one hehe. And...come to think of it...thats what it was for to begin with haha. Good idea!!
You crazy!! Go watch your departures...although... you're almost done aren't you?
Sadly yes. One and a half more episodes. Then imma weep a lil bit. Then ball my blanket into a you shape and hug it til i fall asleep...still weeping
Dramatic much?
Psh no. Totally whats gonna happen gosh
I love you. You can weep. Sob. Ball your eyes out.
*bawl
Ahah oh good! Thank you for not judging me!! Youre so supportive :) And more bad news...Devin sent me a job link...for another one in London haha
:D
YAYAYAYAYAY!!!
Haha. Jk. 'Cept I'm not.
Hahah silly cutie head :) Love you! Also...can we go to Easter Island? It looks friggin awesome
Okie!!
Woohooo!!
Also...while we're technically in Chile, theres an island a lil farther south of Easter and the popultion of said island...100 thousand...penguins haha.
O_O YES!
Haha pack your bags beau. No need for tropical honeymoon. Theys got penguins!
Hahahahahah. PENGUINS!
We keep talking about lymph nodes and it makes me think of angel and how she probably had some sort of lymphatic cancer and now I'm tearing because I'm thinking about her.
Im so sorry, darling :-( Hope youre feeling better. And...be careful please. I just puked my guts out.
WHAT?!?!?! NO NO NO NO NO!!!! I'm so sorry!!!!
